headline: Analysts Turn More Bullish on Nordson (NDSN) After Strong Q4 Results
summary: Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ:NDSN) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2026. On December 15, Vertical Research upgraded Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ:NDSN) to Buy from Hold and set a $270 price target. A few days earlier, on December 12, DA Davidson raised its price target on Nordson to $290 from […]
